WELCOME_MESSAGE_LN_1: Welcome to Luke Vella's Clock Patience simulator! (Patent yet pending).
WELCOME_MESSAGE_LN_2: The game is simple. Firstly, input the amount of decks you wish to play with.
WELCOME_MESSAGE_LN_3: The simulator will then simulate the clock patience game with all of the decks you stipulated, and will output the results of each of your decks.
GAME_START_MESSAGE: A new game has now started. Please input the amount of decks you would like to seed into the clock patience game.
INPUT_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_DECKS: Invalid entry. Please enter a valid number of decks.
SHOWING_ALL_DECKS_MESSAGE: You will now be shown all decks arranged in four lines of 13 cards, each card separated by a single blank space.
DECKS_ RESHUFFLE_INSTRUCTION: If you are unhappy with the way the decks are arranged, type 'reshuffle' followed by the deck you wish to reshuffle (e.g. reshuffle 2). Otherwise, press enter to continue.
